title: Coforge gets Rs 122 crore income tax demand notice
description: The company said that the assessment unit had made an adjustment under transfer pricing due to variation in margin.
content: IT company Coforge has received income tax demand notice of around Rs 122 crore comprising tax demand of Rs 97.97 crore and interest liability of Rs 23.79 crore, the company said in a regulatory filing on Thursday. The notice was received by the company on December 20. Coforge mentioned that it has received a "total tax demand of Rs 97,97,99,720 (including interest liability of Rs 23,79,49,419)". The company said that the assessment unit had made an adjustment under transfer pricing due to variation in margin.
